Infusium 23 Moisture Replenisher Shampoo 16 oz. Nourish Hair from Root to Tip Infusium 23 Moisture Replenisher Shampoo is designed for dry moisture deprived hair. this shampoo makes the hair soft silky and deeply replenished. It hydrates to replenish moisture to dry hair and also nourishes the hair from root to tip. Hydrates dry fly-away hair Nourishes deeplyProvides gentle cleansing Promotes soft healthy hair Make your hair manageable by removing residue and build-up while cleansing with Infusium 23 Moisture Replenisher Shampoo. Just for You: Dry hair A Closer Look: It s formulated with an integrated system of proven science exclusive technology and personalized products that transform the hair to make them soft and manageable. the shampoo is rich in intensive hair-healthy hydrators and moisture-preserving ingredients to nourish deeply and cleanse gently. It also contains pro-vitamins proteins and amino acids. Get Started: Create moisture rich lather by massaging with fingertips into the scalp and hair. Rinse and repeat if desired.
